title: CEO of Citigroup Asia Pacific Francisco Aristeguieta to Present at the Bank of America Merrill Lynch Future of Financials 2018 Conference
summary: New York - Francisco Aristeguieta, CEO of Citigroup Asia Pacific, will present at the Bank of America Merrill Lynch Future of Financials 2018 Conference on Tuesday, November 6, 2018. The presentation will begin at approximately 11:40 a.m. (Eastern). A live webcast and presentation materials will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
tag-1: CEO of Citigroup Asia Pacific Francisco Aristeguieta to Present at the Bank of America Merrill Lynch Future of Financials 2018 Conference
tag-2: New York – Francisco Aristeguieta, CEO of Citigroup Asia Pacific, will present at the Bank of America Merrill Lynch Future of Financials 2018 Conference on Tuesday, November 6, 2018. The presentation will begin at approximately 11:40 a.m. (Eastern). A live webcast and presentation materials will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. tag-3: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
